verbose_text: The present study demonstrates that rapamycin induces autophagy in Nara-H cells by activating the MEK / ERK signaling pathway, and the rapamycin induced apoptosis can be enhanced by the MEK inhibitor, U0126.
evidence: induces autophagy in Nara-H cells by activating the MEK/ERK signaling pathway, and the rapamycin-induced apoptosis
